name: Weak Point
description:
Created for the 2022 Scarlet Game Jam. An arcade-style action game where you dash-n-slash your way through waves of nearly indestructible enemy drones. Thankfully their manufacturer cut corners, and they have but one WEAK POINT...

//------------------//

CONTROLS:

WASDmovementSPACEdash

//------------------//

CREDITS:

  • Sumanta Das - Programmer
  • Daniel Elwell - Programmer + Artist
  • Caro Yeung - Composer
